snippet: Wall Street is on pace for a big year of deal-making. | William A. Ackman may have lost Allergan, but he still came away a winner. | The Justice Department is weighing a civil suit against Angelo R. Mozilo, the former chief executive of Countrywide...
abstract: Wall Street is on pace for a big year of deal-making. | William A. Ackman may have lost Allergan, but he still came away a winner. | The Justice Department is weighing a civil suit against Angelo R. Mozilo, the former chief executive of Countrywide Financial. | U.S. plans second Bitcoin auction.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Return of the Mega-Merger
